channel.title: Basic coding, need Help on after killing a monster
channel.description: Alright all I need is how to make a player teleport AND item added to inventory after killing a certain monster. Like if a player kills the jad, they would get teleported and with an item in their inventory, the fire cape.

item.title: Basic coding, need Help on after killing a monster
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

This is what my codes look like

[code]}
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1022) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = 2584; // Change coordinates
                            ppl.teleportToY = 4836; // Change coordinates
                        }
                        if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1019) {
                            int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
                            client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = 2464; // Change coordinates
                            ppl.teleportToY = 4834; // Change coordinates
                        }
                        if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200) // Chaos elemental
                        {
                            ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomSilvchest(),
                                    npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,
                                    GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
                        }
                        if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1007) {
                            ItemHandler.addItem(6754, npcs[NPCID].absX,
                                    npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID),
                                    false);
                        }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Basic coding, need Help on after killing a monster
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“n0va k0, post:13, topic:191503”][quote author=Graham link=topic=255134.msg2127863#msg2127863 date=1206226757]
It’s p.addItem btw.
[/quote]

No…My server uses ppl. not p.
additem and addItem does nothing[/quote]
No, acctually its however you declared it. Unlesss you declared it as static it probably wont be ppl. but if you declared it as .ppl tmp then it will be ppl.

Read full topic

item.title: Basic coding, need Help on after killing a monster
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[code]NPCHandler.java:1142: cannot find symbol
symbol : method additem(int,int)
location: class client
ppl.additem(6570, 1);// item ID, amt
^
NPCHandler.java:1143: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable teleToX
location: class client
ppl.teleToX = 2978;//x coords
^
NPCHandler.java:1144: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable teleToY
location: class client
ppl.teleToY = 3599;//y coords
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .[code]

I’m a noob at java :|[/code][/code]

item.title: Basic coding, need Help on after killing a monster
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == #)//npc ID { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; p.additem(####, #);// item ID, amt p.teleToX = ####;//x coords p.teleToY = ####;//y coords }

just replace the #'s with the apropriate numbers
